io.lambdacube.aspecio.aspect.interceptor.arguments

Interface ArgumentsUpdater

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ArgumentsTrait

    public interface ArgumentsUpdater
extends ArgumentsTrait

    This interface allows an Advice to update arguments before a method invocation.

    ArgumentsUpdater instances generated Aspecio are mutable.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ArgumentsUpdater EMPTY_ARGUMENTS_UPDATER
      An implementation of an ArgumentsUpdater for a parameter-less method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArgumentsUpdater setBooleanArg(String argName, boolean newValue)
      Set the boolean parameter named argName. boolean parameters are all method parameters strictly typed with primitive type boolean.

      Set the long parameter named argName. long parameters are all method parameters strictly typed with primitive type long.
      ArgumentsUpdater setCharArg(String argName, char newValue)
      Set the char parameter named argName. char parameters are all method parameters strictly typed with primitive type char.

      Set the double parameter named argName. double parameters are all method parameters strictly typed with primitive type double.

      Set the float parameter named argName. float parameters are all method parameters strictly typed with primitive type float.
      ArgumentsUpdater setIntArg(String argName, int newValue)
      Set the int parameter named argName. int parameters are all method parameters strictly typed with primitive type int.
      ArgumentsUpdater setLongArg(String argName, long newValue)
      Set the long parameter named argName. long parameters are all method parameters strictly typed with primitive type long.
      <T> ArgumentsUpdater setObjectArg(String argName, T newValue)
      Set the object parameter named argName.
      ArgumentsUpdater setShortArg(String argName, short newValue)
      Set the short parameter named argName. short parameters are all method parameters strictly typed with primitive type short.
      Arguments update()
      Build the Arguments object corresponding to the current state of this ArgumentsUpdater.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.lambdacube.aspecio.aspect.interceptor.arguments.ArgumentsTrait

        booleanArg, byteArg, charArg, doubleArg, floatArg, intArg, longArg, objectArg, objectArg, parameters, shortArg

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY_ARGUMENTS_UPDATER

        static final ArgumentsUpdater EMPTY_ARGUMENTS_UPDATER
        An implementation of an ArgumentsUpdater for a parameter-less method.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        Arguments update()
        Build the Arguments object corresponding to the current state of this ArgumentsUpdater.
        An Advice should call this method in Advice.ArgumentHook#updateArguments(Arguments) once it is done changing values.
        Returns:
        the Arguments object.

      • setObjectArg

        <T> ArgumentsUpdater setObjectArg(String argName,
                                  T newValue)

        Set the object parameter named argName. Object parameters are all non-native parameters (extending Object ). It is up to the aspect writer to make sure the object is assignable to type T.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the parameter named argName
        Parameters:
        argName - The argument name, as provided by the parameters() method.
        newValue - The new value, must be of a type assignable to the parameter named argName
        Returns:
        This updated ArgumentsUpdater instance, for method chaining.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no Object parameter named argName exists in this method.

      • setIntArg

        ArgumentsUpdater setIntArg(String argName,
                           int newValue)

        Set the int parameter named argName. int parameters are all method parameters strictly typed with primitive type int.

        Parameters:
        argName - The argument name, as provided by the parameters() method.
        newValue - The new value, must be of a type assignable to the parameter named argName
        Returns:
        This updated ArgumentsUpdater instance, for method chaining.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no int parameter named argName exists in this method.
